original_title: Ishq e Qalandar - The Beautiful Sindh
overview: Ishq e Qalandar - The Beautiful Sindh is a travel film that takes viewers through one of the most ancient civilizations on Earth called Sindh. Shezan Saleem Jo-G takes a journey of self-realization, the discovery of his roots, and building a connection with people and spirituality in Sindh.
tagline: Highlighting the true beauty of Sindh, Pakistan as never seen before.
title: Ishq e Qalandar - The Beautiful Sindh
